meta.article_title: November 7, 2011 - How to Ace an Opponent

causes_communes: Opponents are ready for crosscourt serves

debutant: Fake serving crosscourt, then change direction to serve fast topspin down the line
Contact point should be a bit behind the table so that the first bounce can be near your own end-line

exercices_complementaires.description: Use spin, either sidespin or extra topspin, to make the serve more effective. Keep racket aimed at opponent's backhand and hit it down the line with slapping sidespin.

erreurs_a_eviter: Not keeping racket aimed at opponent's backhand
